mapper.select: select eid, ename, edetail, estartdate, eenddate, eamount, elimit, eimage from event
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (eid, ename, edetail, estartdate, eenddate, eamount, elimit, eimage) VALUES (#{eid}, #{ename}, #{edetail}, #{estartdate}, #{eenddate}, #{eamount}, #{elimit}, #{eimage})
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET ename = #{ename}, edetail = #{edetail}, estartdate = #{estartdate}, eenddate = #{eenddate}, eamount = #{eamount}, elimit = #{elimit}, eimage = #{eimage} WHERE eid = #{eid}
